name: T.G.H.N.N.
description:
T.G.H.N.N. 

Select one little shuriken throwing ninjas and overcome countless procedurally generated levels.

T.G.H.N.N. Backstory:

The world is ending, evil Antenoids attacked, and you young ninjas fresh out of ninja academy are the only ones who can try to stop them!

Controls:

A, D  or  Right Arrow, Left Arrow  to move ninjas left or right.
Space to jump.
Left or Right CTRL to attack.
Left or Right SHIFT for special move.  (Each ninja has its special move)  

So buzz words I learned how to put in mu games here are:

Procedural level generation.
Ray casting.
Multiple main characters.

All of the assets in the game are made by me using Gimp and Aseprite.
All of the music and SFX created by me using Audacity and LMMS.

Have fun, I know I did!
